title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 3. Regulation 5 of the Regulations of 2023 is amended –
text_raw:
3. Regulation 5 of the Regulations of 2023 is amended – 

(a) 

in subparagraph (b) of paragraph (1) – 

(i) 

by the substitution of “Part 1 of Schedule 2” for “Schedule 
2”, and 

(ii) by the substitution of “Articles 18 and 27;” for “Articles 18 

and 27.”, 

(b) by the insertion of the following subparagraph after subparagraph 

(b) of paragraph (1): 

“(c) 
declarations (the text of which in the English language is 
set out in Part 2 of Schedule 2) have been made to the Ministry of 
Foreign Affairs of the Kingdom of the Netherlands by the United 
Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, in accordance 
with Articles 25 and 30.”, 

and 

(c) 

by the substitution of the following paragraph for paragraph (3): 

in any subparagraph 

“(3) A declaration 
than 
subparagraph (a)) of paragraph (1) that the declaration or 
declarations, as the case may be, set out in any such subparagraph 
has or have been made shall be evidence of the making, and of 
the content, of that declaration or those declarations.”. 

(other

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 5. The Regulations of 2023 are amended by the substitution of the
text_raw:
5. The Regulations of 2023 are amended by the substitution of the 

following schedule for Schedule 2: 

“SCHEDULE 2 

Regulation 5 

Part 1 (Regulation 5(1)(b)) 

European Union 

Declarations: 

29-09-2022 

The European Union declares, in accordance with Article 27(1) of the 
Convention, that it exercises competence over all the matters governed by this 
Convention. Its Member States will not sign, ratify, accept or approve the 
Convention, but shall be bound by the Convention by virtue of the accession of 
the European Union. 

For the purposes of this declaration, the term ‘European Union’ does not include 
the Kingdom of Denmark by virtue of Articles 1 and 2 of Protocol No 22 on the 
position of Denmark, annexed to the Treaty on European Union and the Treaty 
on the Functioning of the European Union. 

The European Union declares, in accordance with Article 18 of the Convention, 
that it will not apply the Convention to non-residential leases (tenancies) of 
immovable property situated in the European Union. 

Part 2 (Regulation 5(1)(c)) 

United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland 

Declarations: 

27-06-2024 

The United Kingdom declares, in accordance with Article 25, that the 
Convention shall extend to England and Wales only, and that it may at any time 
submit other declarations or modify this declaration in accordance with Article 
30 of the Convention. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [305] 

26-03-2025 

Further to its declaration of 27 June 2024 extending the Convention to England 
and Wales only, the United Kingdom declares, in accordance with Article 25 
and 30, that the Convention shall also extend to Scotland and Northern Ireland.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 July, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 

Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [305] 5

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order amends the European Union (Hague Judgments Convention) 
Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 434 of 2023) to specify the states which are bound 
by the Hague Judgments Convention of 2 July 2019 and includes the text of 
Declarations, Reservations and Specifications made pursuant to the Convention. 

 
 
 
 
 6 [305]
